mapper.update:
update BANK
BANK_CODE = #{bankCode},
BANK_NAME = #{bankName},
BANK_ADDRESS = #{bankAddress},
IN_TOUCH = #{inTouch},
TEL = #{tel},
BANK_HEAD_OFFICE = #{bankHeadOffice},
IS_BANK_HEAD = #{isBankHead},
BUSINESS_PLACE_CODE = #{businessPlaceCode},
IS_YDLW = #{isYdlw},
REMARK = #{remark},
STATUS = #{status},
and ID = #{id}
